title: Qute template with null default parameter fails with unclear NPE
body:
### Describe the bug

As a developer, it may seem like a good idea to define a Qute template parameter with an explicit null default. This would ensure that the parameter is always available, even when templates are sometimes rendered without this parameter provided.


Example:

```qute
{@String name=null}

Hello {name} from Qute!
```

### Expected behavior

This should work or should provide a clear error message outlining what template may have an error, ideally including the parameter name that failed.

[quarkus-null-repro-main.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/22198098/quarkus-null-repro-main.zip)
